price: لعنت‌شدگانند و هر جا که یافت شوند، باید بی‌محابا دستگیر و کشته شوند.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
